key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Whether or not should the editor show line numbers

key.name: show-right-margin
key.description: Whether or not should the editor show a right margin

key.name: right-margin-at
key.description: The number of characters where the right margin is displayed

key.name: use-text-wrap
key.description: Whether or not should the editor use text wrap

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether or not should the editor highlight current line

key.name: highlight-brackets
key.description: Whether or not should the editor highlight matching brackets

key.name: tab-width
key.description: Tab width used by the editor

key.name: insert-spaces
key.description: Whether or not should the editor insert spaces instead of tabs

key.name: auto-indent
key.description: Whether or not should the editor activate automatic indentation

key.name: show-grid-pattern
key.description: Whether or not should the editor show a background grid pattern

key.name: use-default-typo
key.description: Whether or not should the editor use the default typography

key.name: editor-font
key.description: Font to be used by the editor to display text

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Color Scheme to be used by the editor for syntax highlighting

key.name: prefer-dark
key.description: Prefer dark variant for GTK+ theme

key.name: save-workspace
key.description: Whether or not should the editor save the current workspace upon closing and restore it on startup

key.name: insert-braces
key.description: Whether or not should the editor insert the matching brace/bracket/parenthesis on writting

key.name: show-welcome
key.description: Whether or not should the editor show the welcome screen on startup
